description:
Conduct snow analysis using the Bonesaw alone, or extend the handle by attaching it to ski poles or probes with the polyurethane straps and use it as a shelter building tool.

  • One-piece stamped stainless steel
  • Rubber-coated handle for thermal insulation
  • Snow crystal card and ruler embossed into the blade
  • Polyethylene sheath
  • Includes a polyurethane strap for extending the handle
  • Teeth cut on the pull stroke and can be used on wood in emergencies
  • Blade length is 35cm
  • Overall length is 47cm
name: G3 BoneSaw Snow Saw
